title: Determine the Wavelength
text: Determine the wavelength by measuring the distance between two consecutive points in phase.

title: Determine the Amplitude
text: Determine the amplitude by counting the numbers of units to the peak.

title: Determine the Nodes
text: Determine the nodes by counting the number of times the wave intersects the $$x$$ axis.

title: Determine the Antinodes
text: Determine the antinodes by counting the number peaks and troughs.
